titles.title: Water Advanced Technologies for Efficient Resource Use Act of 2024
Water Advanced Technologies for Efficient Resource Use Act of 2024
To provide incentives for the purchase of water-efficient products, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committees on Energy and Commerce, and Oversight and Accountability, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
